verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*, \add even\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w babes|strong="G3516"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

I have \w fed|strong="G4222"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* with \w milk|strong="G1051"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* with \w meat|strong="G1033"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w hitherto|strong="G3768"\w* ye were not \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \add to bear it\add*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* are ye \w able|strong="G1410"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w whereas|strong="G3699"\w* \add there is\add* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w envying|strong="G2205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strife|strong="G2054"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w divisions|strong="G1370"\w*, are \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w while|strong="G3752"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am\add* of \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*; are \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*?

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w ministers|strong="G1249"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* gave \w to|strong="G1325"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w*?

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w planted|strong="G5452"\w*, \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w* \w watered|strong="G4222"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* gave the \w increase|strong="G0837"\w*.

So \w then|strong="G5620"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* is \w he|strong="G2076"\w* that \w planteth|strong="G5452"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* he that \w watereth|strong="G4222"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* that giveth the \w increase|strong="G0837"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w planteth|strong="G5452"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w watereth|strong="G4222"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* labourers \w together|strong="G4904"\w* with \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w husbandry|strong="G1091"\w*, \add ye are\add* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w building|strong="G3619"\w*.

According \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w masterbuilder|strong="G0753"\w*, I have \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* buildeth \w thereon|strong="G2026"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G0991"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* take \w heed|strong="G0991"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he buildeth \w thereupon|strong="G2026"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w lay|strong="G5087"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* that is \w laid|strong="G2749"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w build|strong="G2026"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w silver|strong="G0696"\w*, \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w wood|strong="G3586"\w*, \w hay|strong="G5528"\w*, \w stubble|strong="G2562"\w*;

Every \w man’s|strong="G1538"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* shall be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* shall declare \w it|strong="G1213"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* it shall be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* shall \w try|strong="G1381"\w* every \w man’s|strong="G1538"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of what \w sort|strong="G3697"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath built \w thereupon|strong="G2026"\w*, he shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* a \w reward|strong="G3408"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* shall be \w burned|strong="G2618"\w*, he shall suffer \w loss|strong="G2210"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*; \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3611"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w defile|strong="G5351"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w him|strong="G5126"\w* \w shall|strong="G5351"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w destroy|strong="G5351"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \add temple\add* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1818"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w deceive|strong="G1818"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w seemeth|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, let him \w become|strong="G1096"\w* a \w fool|strong="G3474"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, He \w taketh|strong="G1405"\w* the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w* of the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w let|strong="G2744"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w yours|strong="G5216"\w*;

\w Whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w Cephas|strong="G2786"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* things \w present|strong="G1764"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* things to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*; \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w yours|strong="G5216"\w*;
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* are \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add is\add* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w*.
